name: 2024 6th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Vehicle Engineering
content: Paper Publication: Option A: All submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by technical committee and reviewers of the conference. Accepted paper will be included into Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main databases. Option B: Accepted and registered papers of MEVE is mainly published in conference proceedings. Excellent papers with extension can be recommend to be published in International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR, ISSN: 2278-0149), which will be indexed by Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
organizers: Nanjing University of Science, China and Technology and Beijing Jiaotong University, China
